# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and significance to you, I propose a price of $13,000 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and advantages this product offers you. I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
